article.headline: Niagara 82, Rider 69
article.story: LEWISTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Juan Mendez led Niagara with 24 points and five blocks in an 82-69 win over Rider Sunday. David Brooks scored 18 points and James Reaves added 16 for the Purple Eagles (12-5, 6-2 MAAC). Rider's Jerry Johnson scored a game-high 25 points, going 6-of-9 from the 3-point line as the Broncos (10-7, 4-3) trailed by as much as 21 before cutting the lead to five with 4:48 left. Steve Castleberry scored 14 points for Rider while Robert Taylor had 11. Tremmell Darden had 13 and Alvin Cruz added 11 points for Niagara. Niagara jumped out to an early lead with a 13-3 spurt, shooting 56 percent and taking a 40-23 advantage at halftime. Niagara was 27 of 55 from the floor while Rider shot 24 of 57 for the game.
